1.78.text: Traces is coming back to us again!

3.18.text: It was last here a few years ago

4.70.text: From the Canadian contemporary circus company 7 Fingers

7.66.text: And they're in this tradition of bringing circus acts into the stage

10.50.text: And making it more of a theatrical presentation

12.52.text: So in fact you're entering the world of the artists

16.19.text: Traces is a classic piece of contemporary circus

19.72.text: It's got a narrative, the artists talk to you

22.12.text: You feel very much part of their world

23.84.text: And of course, it's got all the usual fantastic skills

26.66.text: that you would expect from a company like 7 Fingers

32.00.text: All told in an entertaining - and quite a sort of urban

36.64.text: It's nothing like a big top - in fact it's the opposite!
